title: Handle a Flight Delay
description: A passenger's flight is delayed by 3 hours. They want to know their options.

tasks.description: Retrieve the passenger's booking and confirm the delay.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the flight is delayed and provides the new estimated departure time.

tasks.description: Check the reason for the delay (e.g., technical, weather, air traffic control).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the delay is due to a technical issue with the aircraft.

tasks.description: Inform the passenger of their options, such as waiting for the flight or being rebooked on a later flight, and issue a meal voucher as per policy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains the options and successfully issues a meal voucher.
